title: WTB: Low grade T206 Speaker (raw or graded) - SOVEREIGN?
author: AGuinness

posts.post_title: WTB: Low grade T206 Speaker (raw or graded) - SOVEREIGN?
posts.post_content:
Time to put more energy into this search...

... also time to update things based on what I now know about possible Speaker T206 back options.

I'm looking for a low grade Tris Speaker T206, either raw or graded, with one of the following backs:

Tolstoi
Drum
Cycle
American Beauty
Carolina Brights
Broadleaf

Would consider a Sovereign!

I'd be delighted to hear from any of you if you have one that you'd be willing to part with. Please email or message me! Thanks!

Still looking! Would love to cross this off my list!


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
Updated with better info! Thanks and hope this helps in the search.

I have the Tris Speaker T206 American Beauty for sale.

See scanned pics of the front & back of the card via the link below...

[URL="https://www.ebluejay.com/ads/item/6846564"]https://www.ebluejay.com/ads/item/6846564[/URL]

[quote name="BlueDevil89" post=1780606]I have the Tris Speaker T206 American Beauty for sale.

See scanned pics of the front & back of the card via the link below...

[URL="https://www.ebluejay.com/ads/item/6846564"]https://www.ebluejay.com/ads/item/6846564[/URL][/QUOTE]

Thanks for reaching out, but I'm going for something with a little less paper loss on it. GL with the sale!

Still on the hunt for this Speaker! Please reach out if you have something that may be of interest!
